description: Building on UX Design: From Concept to Wireframe, this UX course you will show you how to take a set of wireframes and interaction architecture and embody it in an interactive prototype. Using a state-of-the-art prototyping tool, you will build a testable prototype and use it to gain preliminary user feedback. You will also learn about how to document your prototype so that a development team can take it to the next level.
title: UXD6: UX Design: From Wireframe to Prototype
